name: Evanora
text: Hello there young adventurer.. you must be wondering why you have been summoned...

name: Evanora
text: You are here to solve the mystery plaguing Telmaron...

name: Evanora
text: Please make your way over to the blacksmith so that he can forge you a weapon for the journey ahead...

name: Evanora
text: As a token of good faith here is a healing potion to help you on your way.

name: Evanora
text: If you ever need anything I am the medicine woman here to heal your pain..
